name: Backrooms: Explore Outside Reality
description:
Backrooms: Explore Outside Reality is a first-person, horror (mostly), and exploration game where you'll be forced upon a long adventure through the many levels of the Backrooms. (This version only has one level) 

You'll get to experience a fully-fledged story throughout your adventures as you meet new people, discover new levels and entities, and make your way through the unknown. (No story in prototype yet) 

We plan on possibly taking this project further in the future to add many more levels and high quality polish to things if we were to ever make a full release, but for now, we (Randy and Bedrock) want to work on this as a hobby. We will update the project as we make further improvements and additions at some point in the future.

The level is 100% fully randomly generated, as well as the final room.

There is an ending to this prototype in the form of a room that you can find behind a door far out into the level.

Controls:

  1. Movement: WASD 
  2. Jump: SPACE
  3. Sprint: SHIFT
  4. Crouch: Ctrl
  5. Interact: E
  6. Close Game: ESC
  7. Noclipping: 

Any feedback and ideas would be appreciated, join our discord server or respond to the feedback discussion.

https://discord.gg/rcdF7HjCCz
